headline: Fall Savings: Energy Bills to Include $58 California Climate Credit for PG&E Customers
summary: In October, millions of residential and eligible small business customers will see a California Climate Credit automatically applied to their Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) electric bill. No action is required to receive the credit.

raw.headline: Fall Savings: Energy Bills to Include $58 California Climate Credit for PG&E Customers
raw.summary: In October, millions of residential and eligible small business customers will see a California Climate Credit automatically applied to their Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) electric bill. No action is required to receive the credit.

headline: Jefferies Raises PT on  PG&E Corporation (PCG), Keeps a Buy
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the Best Low Cost Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 2, Jefferies analyst Julien Dumoulin-Smith maintained a Buy rating on PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) while raising the price target from $19 to $22. The analyst noted the leaked wildfire bill was added to SB254, which was a securitization […]
